title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8197-2.10 - Time of filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8197-2.10 - Time of filing

State Regulations
(a) Reports
required to be filed by sections
8197-2.1
through
8197-2.3
of this Subpart shall be filed by April 30th annually. (b) Reports of Estimated Changes to Plant and

Equipment for the period January 1st through June 30th of the current year
shall be filed by August 15th annually. (c) Reports required by section
8197-2.6
(c) of this Subpart shall be filed by August 31st annually. (d) Reports required by section
8197-2.6
(a) of this Subpart or the applications for exemption from such reports authorized
by section
8197-2.6
(b) shall be filed on April 30th annually. (e) Reports required to be filed by section
8197-2.7
of this Subpart shall be filed by April 30th annually, except for FERC
regulated transmission pipeline companies whose reports shall be filed by May
15th annually. (f) An application
for an allowance for obsolescence or for use of an alternative valuation
component pursuant to section
8197-2.8
of this Subpart must be filed at the time of the filing of the report which
provides information concerning the property for which the allowance is
sought. (g) For good cause shown
upon written request, ORPTS may extend the time for the filing of any of these
reports. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8197-2.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
